import React from "react"; import { LiquidGlassCard, LiquidGlassButton } from "../components/ui/liquid-glass"; import { Badge } from "../components/ui/badge"; import { FadeIn, ScaleIn, StaggerContainer, StaggerItem } from "../components/ScrollAnimations"; import { AppleRevealText } from "../components/BikeBearAnimations"; import { Users, Target, Award, Zap, CheckCircle, ArrowRight, Phone, Mail, MapPin, Clock } from "lucide-react"; const About = () => { const values = [ { icon: , title: "Customer First", description: "We prioritize our customers needs and satisfaction above all else, ensuring every interaction exceeds expectations." }, { icon: , title: "Excellence", description: "We strive for excellence in every project, delivering high-quality solutions that stand the test of time." }, { icon: , title: "Innovation", description: "We embrace cutting-edge technology and innovative approaches to solve complex IT challenges." }, { icon: , title: "Reliability", description: "We provide dependable, consistent service that our clients can count on for their critical IT needs." } ]; const stats = [ { value: "500+", label: "Happy Customers" }, { value: "1000+", label: "Devices Serviced" }, { value: "3+", label: "Years Experience" }, { value: "24/7", label: "Support Available" } ]; const team = [ { name: "Harresh", role: "Founder & CEO", description: "Visionary leader with 5+ years in IT solutions" }, { name: "Vishvaaraj", role: "Co-Founder & CTO", description: "Technical expert specializing in hardware solutions" }, { name: "Viroshan", role: "Co-Founder & COO", description: "Operations specialist ensuring quality service delivery" } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
About Us

About Netrik Techworks

Your trusted partner in technology solutions, delivering excellence and innovation since 2021.

{/* Values Section */}

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do

{values.map((value, index) => (
{value.icon}

{value.title}

{value.description}

))}
{/* Team Section */}

Meet Our Team

The passionate individuals behind Netrik Techworks

{team.map((member, index) => (
{member.name.charAt(0)}

{member.name}

{member.role}

{member.description}

))}
{/* Stats Section */}

Our Impact

Numbers that speak to our commitment and success

{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Work With Us?

Let's discuss how we can help transform your technology needs into solutions.

Call Us: +60 12-495 3622 Email Us
); }; export default About;
